items.summary: In HeroSection.tsx, replace the current profile image src with the external LinkedIn URL: https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQG_vKIcM3o7oQ/profile-displayphoto-scale_400_400/B4DZw8fRO0HwAg-/0/1770541359476?e=1773878400&v=beta&t=hNLsHkQFnEh-Boegm1kbBhX7F8v1P42PUa-DT2DJzkk. The target element is the at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1] (the profile photo in the Hero section). Update the img src to point directly to this LinkedIn URL, retaining all existing alt text, className, and fallback/error handling logic.
